H0.text: Who was captain of the US team for the 2014 Ryder Cup. Phil Mickelson

H1.text: Who was captain of the US team for the 2014 Ryder Cup. Davis Love III

H2.text: Who was captain of the US team for the 2014 Ryder Cup. Fred Couples

H3.text: Who was captain of the US team for the 2014 Ryder Cup. Tom Watson

A4.text: Watson again captained the U.S. Team in 2014 in Scotland

A5.text: Watson captained the American side to victory in 1993 at The Belfry in England
